snippet: The boy, Izayah Hall, was found strangled in his family's apartment on Friday. His five siblings are now in the care of the city's child welfare agency.
abstract: The boy, Izayah Hall, was found strangled in his family's apartment on Friday. His five siblings are now in the care of the city's child welfare agency.

byline.original: By ANDY NEWMAN and ERIC P. NEWCOMER

headline.main: Mother of Queens 2-Year-Old Charged in His Murder
headline.print_headline: Queens Mother Who Had Regained Custody of Children Is Charged With Strangling Boy, 2
